titles: Proclamation for a solemn national thanksgiving and publick prayers.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)
publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the eight day of November, and of Our Reign the eleventh year, 1699.
Signed: Gilb. Elliot Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
